name: displayData
description: Generate a detailed packing list and trip plan based on the tourist's trip information, weather forecast, and personal preferences.

city.description: The city or location name of the trip destination.

country.description: The country name of the trip destination.

title.description: A creative title for the trip that includes the userName and the destination in the format: City, Country.

objectsList.description: A detailed list of items to pack, specifying the quantity, the item, and a brief description for each.

quantity.description: The quantity of each item to pack.

item.description: The name of the item to pack.

description.description: A short description or reason why this item is recommended.

mustHave.description: A list of must-have items for the trip, such as passport, tickets, money, charger, etc.

requiredItems.description: Include the items the user has writen in as required items.

description.description: A brief description of the trip, capturing its essence in a maximum of three paragraphs.

countryCode.description: The ISO-3166 country code for the trip destination.

tour.description: Three suggested tours or activities in the city or location.
